snippets.title: Hero: Badge
snippets.code:
<gds-flex align-items="center" gap="m">
  <gds-badge variant="negative" notification>999+</gds-badge>
  <gds-badge variant="positive">
    <gds-icon-circle-check slot="lead"></gds-icon-circle-check>
    Positive
  </gds-badge>
  <gds-badge size="small" variant="warning"> 602 </gds-badge>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Blur
snippets.code:
<gds-blur>
  <gds-text>Blurred content</gds-text>
</gds-blur>

snippets.title: Hero: Breadcrumb
snippets.code: Green Folder Current

snippets.title: Hero: Button
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
  <gds-button size="small">Primary</gds-button>
  <gds-button rank="secondary" size="small" variant="positive">
    <gds-icon-credit-card slot="lead"></gds-icon-credit-card>
    Secondary
  </gds-button>
  <gds-button size="small" label="Next step 2" rank="secondary">
    <gds-icon-arrow-right> </gds-icon-arrow-right>
  </gds-button>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Calendar
snippets.code:
<gds-flex overflow="hidden" height="220px">
  <gds-calendar></gds-calendar>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Card
snippets.code:
<gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
  <gds-card
    variant="primary"
    border-color="primary"
    width="140px"
    height="140px"
  >
    Primary
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    border-color="secondary"
    width="140px"
    height="140px"
  >
    Secondary
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="tertiary"
    border-color="tertiary"
    width="140px"
    height="140px"
  >
    Tertiary
  </gds-card>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Checkbox
snippets.code:
<gds-checkbox-group>
  <gds-checkbox label="Checkbox 1" value="1"></gds-checkbox>
  <gds-checkbox label="Checkbox 2" value="2" checked></gds-checkbox>
  <gds-checkbox label="Checkbox 3" value="3"></gds-checkbox>
</gds-checkbox-group>

snippets.title: Hero: Coachmark
snippets.code:
<gds-text tag="p" id="mark">Coachmark</gds-text>
<gds-coachmark .target=${['#mark']} placement="bottom">
Coachmark content.
</gds-coachmark>

snippets.title: Hero: Context menu
snippets.code:
<gds-context-menu>
    <gds-flex slot="trigger" gap="s" align-items="center">
      <gds-icon-text-edit></gds-icon-text-edit>
      Edit
    </gds-flex>
    <gds-menu-item>
      <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
        <gds-icon-ai></gds-icon-ai>
        Help me write
      </gds-flex>
    </gds-menu-item>
    <gds-menu-item>
      <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
        <gds-icon-brush></gds-icon-brush>
        Fix grammar
      </gds-flex>
    </gds-menu-item>
  </gds-context-menu>

snippets.title: Hero: Datepicker
snippets.code:
<gds-flex width="200px">
  <gds-datepicker show-week-numbers></gds-datepicker>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Details
snippets.code:
<gds-flex flex-direction="column" width="280px">
  <gds-details name="group-1" summary="First Details" size="small">
    <gds-rich-text> Details content </gds-rich-text>
  </gds-details>
  <gds-details name="group-1" summary="Second Details" size="small">
    <gds-rich-text> Details content </gds-rich-text>
  </gds-details>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Div
snippets.code:
<gds-flex align-items="center" gap="s">
<gds-div
  width="4xl"
  height="4xl"
  background="primary"
  border-color="primary"
  border-width="xs"
></gds-div>

<gds-div
  width="4xl; l{ 6xl }"
  height="4xl; l{ 6xl }"
  background="secondary"
  border="4xs"
></gds-div>

<gds-div
  width="4xl"
  height="4xl"
  background="tertiary"
  border-radius="s"
></gds-div>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Divider
snippets.code:
<gds-div min-width="280px" align-items="center">
  <gds-divider
    color="quarternary"
    size="2xl"
    width="100%"
  ></gds-divider>
</gds-div>

snippets.title: Hero: Dropdown
snippets.code:
<gds-flex width="280px">
  <gds-dropdown label="Select tech" hide-label>
    <gds-option value="">Select tech</gds-option>
    <gds-option value="warp">Warp Drive</gds-option>
    <gds-option value="cybernetics">Cybernetics</gds-option>
    <gds-option value="nanotechnology">Nanotechnology</gds-option>
    <gds-option value="cloning">Cloning</gds-option>
    <gds-option value="cryonics">Cryonics</gds-option>
    <gds-option value="teleportation">Teleportation</gds-option>
  </gds-dropdown>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: FAB
snippets.code:
<gds-flex>
  <gds-fab
    inset="auto"
    position="relative"
    variant="positive"
    rank="secondary"
    size="small"
  >
    Floating <gds-signal slot="trail"></gds-signal>
  </gds-fab>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Filter chips
snippets.code:
<gds-filter-chips
  value="top-news"
  label="Pick news channel"
  row-collapse
>
  <gds-filter-chip value="all">All</gds-filter-chip>
  <gds-filter-chip value="top-news">Top news</gds-filter-chip>
  <gds-filter-chip value="division">Division</gds-filter-chip>
</gds-filter-chips>

snippets.title: Hero: Flex
snippets.code:
<gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="s">
  <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center">
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="40px" height="40px">
      01
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="40px" height="40px">
      02
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="10px" height="40px">
      03
    </gds-card>
  </gds-flex>
  <gds-flex gap="s" align-items="center" justify-content="flex-end">
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="40px" height="40px">
      04
    </gds-card>
    <gds-card variant="secondary" width="10px" height="40px">
      05
    </gds-card>
  </gds-flex>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Form summary
snippets.code:
<form style="width: 450px">
  <gds-flex flex-direction="column" gap="m">
    <input
      id="designation"
      type="text"
      aria-invalid="true"
      data-label="Designation"
      data-errormessage="A designation is required"
      required=""
      hidden
    />
    <gds-form-summary id="summary"></gds-form-summary>
  </gds-flex>
</form>

snippets.title: Hero: Grid
snippets.code:
<gds-grid columns="12" gap="xs" width="280px">
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    grid-column="1/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="2xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Nav</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    grid-column="1/5"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Sidebar</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
  <gds-card
    variant="secondary"
    grid-column="5/13"
    border-radius="xs"
    height="6xl"
    padding="xs"
  >
    <gds-text tag="small">Content</gds-text>
  </gds-card>
</gds-grid>

snippets.title: Hero: Home
snippets.code:
<gds-flex align-items="center" justify-content="center">
<gds-badge variant="negative" notification="">10+</gds-badge>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Icon
snippets.code:
<gds-flex alig-items="center" gap="m">
  <gds-icon-ai size="xl"></gds-icon-ai>
  <gds-icon-bank size="xl"></gds-icon-bank>
  <gds-icon-rocket size="xl"></gds-icon-rocket>
</gds-flex>

snippets.title: Hero: Input
snippets.code:
<gds-input>
  <gds-icon-people-profile slot="lead"></gds-icon-people-profile>
</gds-input>

snippets.title: Hero: Radio
snippets.code:
<gds-radio-group>
  <gds-radio label="Radio Option 1" supporting-text="Supporting text" value="1"></gds-radio>
  <gds-radio label="Radio Option 2" supporting-text="Supporting text" value="2"></gds-radio>
  <gds-radio label="Radio Option 3" supporting-text="Supporting text" value="3"></gds-radio>
</gds-radio-group>

snippets.title: Hero: Segmented control
snippets.code:
<gds-segmented-control>
  <gds-segment value="1">Item 1</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="2">Item 2</gds-segment>
  <gds-segment value="3">Item 3</gds-segment>
</gds-segmented-control>

snippets.title: Hero: Select
snippets.code:
<gds-select>
  <gds-icon-books slot="lead"></gds-icon-books>
  <select>
    <option value="">Select a value</option>
    <optgroup label="Physics">
      <option value="quantum-mechanics">Quantum Mechanics</option>
      <option value="relativity">Relativity</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Chemistry">
      <option value="organic-chemistry">Organic Chemistry</option>
      <option value="inorganic-chemistry">Inorganic Chemistry</option>
    </optgroup>
    <optgroup label="Biology">
      <option value="genetics">Genetics</option>
      <option value="microbiology">Microbiology</option>
      <option value="ecology">Ecology</option>
    </optgroup>
  </select>
</gds-select>

snippets.title: Hero: Textarea
snippets.code: <gds-textarea label="Label" supporting-text="Supporting text."></gds-textarea>
